(Simplified: 懑)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: With a heavy 滿 heart 心; 滿 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 滿 [ mǎn ] to fill; full, packed; satisfied
    • 心 [ xīn ] heart; mind; soul
①煩悶，生氣：憤懣。煩懣。
懣然 [ mèn rán ]: dejectedly

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to be sick at heart, sorrowful, sad.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 烦懣 fán mèn (boring)

Importance by frequency 常用频率:

Shuowen 说文解字: 煩也從心從滿

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 懣 from heart 心 xīn and phonetic flood-man 满滿 mǎn.

懣字的基本解释

懣
mèn
见“懑”。

懣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mèn］
［《廣韻》莫困切，去慁，明。］
［《廣韻》模本切，上混，明。］
［《廣韻》莫旱切，上緩，明。］
“懑1”的繁体字。“鞔2”的被通假字。
(1)烦闷。
(2)愤慨。
(3)昏。
(4)用同“們”。用于代词或指人的名词后，表示复数。

懣字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懣； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页406第45
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫困切，音悶。【說文】煩也。从心从滿，滿亦聲。　又【廣韻】模本切【集韻】【會韻】【正韻】母本切，?音悗。或省作?，亦作㦖鞔。【禮·問喪】悲哀志懣氣盛。【陸德明·音義】懣，亡本反。又音滿。范音悶。　又【集韻】【會韻】?母伴切，音滿。【史記·倉公傳】使人煩懣食不下。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mèn］
["Guangyun" is not difficult to cut, go to confuse, Ming. ]
["Guangyun" model cut, mixed up, Ming. ]
["Guangyun" does not cut dry, slow up, and clear. ]
"懑1" in traditional characters. The false word for "鞔2".
(1) Depression.
(2) Outrage.
(3) Faint.
(4) Use the same "men". After a noun used for pronouns or people, it means plural.

[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　懑; Kangxi strokes: 18; page number: page 406 to 45
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Don't cut it, the sound is dull. [Said the text] Annoying. From the heart to the full, the full is also the sound.　[Guangyun] Modular cut [Ji Yun] [Hui Yun] [Zheng Yun] Maternal cut,? Yin Yang. Or province for?, also for 㦖鞔. 【Rite·Funny】Sorrowful and full of spirit. [Lu Deming·Sound and Meaning] I am ignorant, and I am rebellious. It's full again. Fan Yin is bored.　[Ji Yun] [Hui Yun]? Mother with cut, full of sound. 【Historical Records·Cang Gongzhuan】It is annoying to eat.
